title: Ancient Fossil in China Rewrites Story of Early Animal Migration
description: The discovery of a new dicynodont species suggests early land animals moved across Pangaea later and more widely than previously thought.

title: Ancient ‘pleasure boat’ discovered near palace ruins tied to history’s most controversial queen
description: Archaeologists recently discovered the remnants of an ancient Egyptian "pleasure boat" near the ruins of Cleopatra VII's lost palace in Alexandria's royal harbor.
